ygData.subject: Re: Bronze armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Brad himself admitted in a recent post to an EQV web-board that Permafrost was the best place for finding the most med. Bronze. Maeric al Fal
ygData.messageBody:
Brad himself admitted in a recent post to an EQV web-board that Permafrost
was the best place for finding the most med. Bronze.

Maeric al'Fal


>From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>

>Subject: [EverQuest] Bronze armor

>
>From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>

>What location, and on what monsters can I find the following:

>Sm Bronze Armor
>Lg Bronze Armor
>Med Bronze Armor
>Blood Stained Mantle
